mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article(title, content, author_id, status, view_count, like_count, comment_count, created_at, updated_at) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{author_id}, #{status}, #{view_count}, #{like_count}, #{comment_count}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, status=#{status}, updated_at=NOW() WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE article SET status=3, deleted_at=NOW() WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM article WHERE author_id = #{id} and status = #{status}
SELECT * FROM article WHERE status != 3 ORDER BY published_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
